description.narrative: PREMCI’s objective is to enhance the manufacturing and widespread application of energy efficient electric motors in China.

activity-description.narrative: the project select some provinces as demonstration site

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

description.narrative: 1. Cumulative CO2 emissions reduction in the application of EE motors by end-of-project (EOP), kt 2. Reduction in the annual growth rate of GHG emissions by EOP compared to that in Year 1, % 3. Electricity savings due to project intervention by EOP, GWh/yr 4. Percent of the local electric motor manufacturers in China producing HEMs and REMs by EOP, % 5. Average annual HEM production output by EOP, Kw 6. Average annual REM production output by EOP, Kw 7. Cumulative capacity of low-efficiency electric motors phased-out, Kw 8. No. of local electric motor manufacturers that produce EE motors by EOP 9. No. of electric motor suppliers/retailers that sell EE motors by EOP. 10. % annual growth rate (YOY) of HEM production in the demonstration pilot companies starting Year 3 11. Average annual national production of HEM by EOP, Kw 12. % annual growth rate (YOY) of REM production in demonstration pilot companies starting Year 3 13. Average annual national production of REM by EOP, Kw 14. No. of EM manufacturers that produce EE motors (HEM/REM) by EOP 15. % of market share of EE motors by EOP 16. Average annual volume of EE motor sales by EOP, MW

Outcome 1 Policy and regulatory frameworks on the production and application of EE motors 1)Completed survey of the local electric motor market in China: In accordance with the schedule, Shanghai Testing & Inspection Institute for Electrical Equipment conducts a sample survey of the motor enterprises in some urban areas in China. Based on the relevant data and data from the National Bureau of Statistics and the Motor Industry Association, it calculated the production and promotion of efficient motor in China, and completed the “Domestic Market Research Report” and the "Domestic Motor Market Research-China Industrial Sector Motor Market Research Report". The report shows that in 2017, the domestic motor output reached 2585 million kW, the share of EE motors was 8.72%, about 114.2million kW . Compared with 2016, the HEM was declined, since the government’s financial subsidy policy has stopped, and the promotion of HEM in China is still dependence on the policy. The report also points out that the high voltage has more advantages than the low-voltage motor in remanufacturing motors due to the market and technical advantages. 2)Completed review of existing policies and regulations applicable to EE motors applications in industries in China: According to the project schedule and budget arrangement, Shenyang University of Technology summarized and analyzed the promotion policies, regulations and suggestions of EE motors at home and abroad, conducted field research visits to key enterprises, completed the “Report of the Policy Research and Recommendation for Chinese Electric Machines”, and put forward policies and regulations in line with the current trend in China. Suggestions include government incentives, tax relief, voluntary agreements, etc. Outcome 2 Energy efficient electric motor production and applications 1)Development of energy efficiency design standard for the integrated electric motor application system: Since the end of 2017,the key technologies related to variable speed AC motor, low speed and high torque permanent magnet synchronous motor, synchronous reluctance motor system and three-phase asynchronous motor with cast copper rotor have been studied by the pilot company from Shanghai. The compilation of four standards of "IE Code for Rotating Motor Efficiency Classification (Part 2): Variable Speed AC Motor" and "DDPMSM Series Belt Type",low-speed and high-torque permanent magnet synchronous motor for conveyor, SynRM series (IP55) synchronous reluctance motor technical conditions (seat number 90-280), YZTE4 series (IP55) copper-cast rotor three-phase asynchronous motor technical conditions (seat number 80-180) were drafted and completed, which fills the blank in the EE motors standard system. 2)Development of specialized HEM design software and model: According to the time schedule, the pilot company from Shanghai has completed the research and design of EE motors’ software and model. In the aspect of mathematical model research, the research work of EE motor design method has been completed, including silicon steel sheet material, self-defined groove, unequal turn winding and other mathematical models. The accuracy of mathematical model can meet the design requirements of EE motor through prototype test and verification. In software development, based on the research results of mathematical model, the compilation of software related functional modules has been completed. Through application testing, the software has friendly interface in human-computer interaction, easy operation, high design efficiency, and can meet the needs of motor designers. The software has been successfully applied to the design of IE4 motor by prototype test. The development of software is conducive to improving the design accuracy of EE motors, shortening the development cycle of motor products, saving the development cost of motors, and providing strong support for the renewal and replacement of high efficiency motors in China. 3)Demonstration of improved EE motor product design and manufacturing: Shandong demonstration pilot company Kaiyuan Electric Motors Company completed efficient manufacturing 2,808 thousand kilowatts in the period, and the annual task target was fulfilled. And mostly, among them, about 823MW of ultra-high efficiency motors was sale. At the same time, with the promotion of EE motors, some achievements have been made in research and development: design ultra-high efficiency and ultra-high efficiency YE4 and YE3 series energy-saving motors, such as high-efficiency direct-connected motor for low vibration and noise water pumps, special direct-connected motor for interpolated high-efficiency oil pumps, and ultra-high efficiency water supply system jointly developed by water pumping plants. The energy-saving effect is obviously increased than before, and the energy-saving control system is also developed for the specific user's actual operating place. In addition, taking advantage of the Internet, the company has set up a special e-commerce service and sales promotion agency to promote EE motors. Anhui demonstration pilot company By the end of 2018, Wannan motor company has promoted the sales of 9,949 thousand kilowatts high efficiency motor, which include IE4 series EE motors 116 thousand kilowatts, IE3 series EE motors 2,257 thousand kilowatts, IE2series3-class EE motors 5,184 thousand kilowatts, other series 3-class EE motors 2,320 thousand kilowatts, and remanufacturing motor 72 thousand kilowatts. In the next step, according to the characteristics of the domestic motor market, the company will take steel, mining, building materials, machinery, cement as the key industries of market promotion, and take the equipment manufacturing enterprises such as fans, pumps, compressors and air conditioning refrigerators, which operate for a long time, as the focus of market promotion, and provide targeted support to industry leaders and domestic high-end customers. The promotion of EE motors will be further strengthened to form demonstration and driving effects. Hu’nan demonstration pilot company According to the promotion objectives formulated at the beginning, Xiangtan Electric motor company completed production of high efficient electric motors 2,876 thousand kilowatts in 2018, which exceeding the task target. In addition, it assisted Shanghai demonstration pilot company to complete the development of EE motors standards and design software and models of EE motors. In addition, during the implementation of the project, starting from the market demand of domestic motor market, and combining with the advantages of enterprises themselves, the promotion strategy of EE motor is actively adjusted. At the technical level, research and develop the environmentally friendly high power density motors and made them serialization; at the marketing level, changing the direction to energy-saving permanent magnet motors system. For example, in Yunnan, the company adopts low-speed permanent magnet direct drive motor to replace the original high-speed motor accelerator and decelerator scheme, which simplifies the transmission link between motor and mechanical load, and it is estimated that annual power saving can reach 600,000 degrees. Outcome 3 Energy efficient electric motor production and applications 1)Developed and implemented suitable business models for local financial institutions to support EE motor production and application In accordance with the project work plan and budget arrangement, the Energy and Environmental Development Research Center has held start-up meetings, seminars and other working meetings, and completed the “Commercial Model of Marketing Promotion of China's Efficiency and Energy-saving motors”. In the second stage, the company organized a survey of typical domestic motor manufacturers to understand the current situation and problems of EE motor manufacturers in the promotion, and completed the "China's strategy and plan for the promotion of high-efficiency and energy-saving motor". The report puts forward seven promotion methods for the promotion of EE motors in China, including improving the energy-saving policies and standards system of motors, formulating differential tariffs, improving the design standards of design institutes, improving the management level of energy-using enterprises, adopting energy-saving service mode, relying on economic means and renovated eliminating motors to remanufacturing. Outcome 4 Increased market share of energy efficient electric motors 1)Completed industrial consumer education campaigns on EE motor (HEM and REM) applications Since December 2017, when the Electronics Society applied for the training of EE motors, experts was organized to confirm training outline and content, and compile training materials in the preliminary stage. Then conducted three training courses in Dongguan City , Chengdu City and Zhenjiang City on October 29, November 6 and November 13, respectively. A total of more than 170 motor-related managers in 31 provinces were trained. The training course adopted a combination of classroom teaching, seminars, exchanges and on-site observation. It introduced to the trainees the policies and standards for improving motor energy efficiency, current situation analysis, energy-saving technology analysis of EE motors, energy-efficiency upgrading technology and application of EE motor system, and case analysis, etc.
